Rail Transportation

  • Types of rail vehicles:
  • Boxcars and gondola cars
  • Various size and capacity containers
  • Tank wagons
  • Hopper cars

Advantages:

  • Capacity
  • Cost effectiveness
  • Safety
  • Reliability

Portgate LLC has over 20 years of experience in the field of railroad cargo transportation both locally (within the TRACECA corridor) and internationally (from/to CIS countries). We respond timely and professionally to all complicated railway and intermodal transportation requirements of our customers. We also fulfill complicated orders, including those related to the delivery of dangerous cargoes at a greater distance.

Rail freight service shortlist

  • Railway tariff calculation
  • Bringing up wagons for further shunting in Ports, terminals or spur lines for loading/unloading operations
  • Custom clearance formalities
  • Destinations From/To CIS countries
  • Transportation of conventional cargo by general and modified r/wagons
  • Transportation of Sea Container on r/w platforms
  • Railage of temperature maintained cargo
  • Railage of Tank containers
  • Handling at r/w branches at origin and destinations
  • Storage and warehousing
  • Loading -Unloading and door delivery
  • Renting of wagons and locomotives

ABOUT PORTGATE

Since 1999 PORTGATE carries out all kinds of international cargo transportation mainly in the Caucasus region, Central Asia and the CIS countries. The majority of the transportations are completed through the TRACECA corridor.
